[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="ed6c8d2a0e074536b787d582cee53a41" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]구조대로 JOB CHANGE한 건[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
대장한테 SCOUT 제의를 받았기 때문입니다.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ed6c8d2a0e074536b787d582cee53a41" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]그 제의가 없었다면[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
지금도 우주 항공사의 PILOT이었을 겁니다.
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Continue_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="4558914a9a684effbf1f7c44a96513c4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]다른 용건이 있습니까?
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="f8540d95eaf74b84a789d540dff800c8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]HI, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]와치[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
오늘도 RIDE ON,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] 잘 부탁합니다!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="ce56bc6af5ba4f85858e40ca8c049bac" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]와치[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] BUDDY와는 친합니까?
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Confirm_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="5070b5d015fa4edea7cd6f7e19094687" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]출발하겠습니까?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
이 행성과는 GOOD BYE입니다!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_TakeOff_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="5a910239671941e5aaa09cf5fd8923ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]OK,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] 셰퍼드호에 RIDE ON![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
바로 TAKE OFF합니다!
LF002.LF002_Area500_Talk_Outro_A01: [Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="436189b48f2b4033835c4a2bfe9b18e3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]SEE YOU입니다!
